thread.title: Pats take advantage of Colts' aggressive play in 34-27 win

title: Pats take advantage of Colts' aggressive play in 34-27 win
text:
> Indiana Pats take advantage of Colts' aggressive play in 34-27 win New England Patriots running back LeGarrette Blount (29) goes over Indianapolis Colts cornerback Greg Toler (28) for a touchdown in the second half of an NFL football game in Indianapolis, Sunday, Oct. 18, 2015. (AP Photo/AJ Mast)
